contentrichtext.text: '''IBS''' may stand for: == Academia == * [[International Business School, Budapest]], a partnership with Oxford Brookes University based in Hungary dating from 1991 * [[International Biometric Society]], an academic statistical association for mathematical and statistical methods in the biosciences * Indiana Boys School, a former name of [[Plainfield Juvenile Correctional Facility]] * [[Institute of Bangladesh Studies]], a research institute in Rajshahi University == Associations == * [[Institute of Broadcast Sound]], a UK broadcasting professional association-now see Institute of Professional Sound * [[Intercollegiate Broadcasting System]], an organization of non-profit, education-affiliated radio stations (and webcasters) * [[International Bible Society]], a former name of [[Biblica]], a group that translates and publishes the Bible with the intent of Christian proselytization * Instytutu BadaÅ„ Strukturalnych, [[the Institute for Structural Research]] * [[International Boy Scouts, Troop 1|International Boy Scouts]], a historic Boy Scout Group in Japan * [[International Bank of Settlements]], the international central bank of central banks == Business == * [[Internet Broadcasting]], a web design firm focused on broadcast television * [[International Builders' Show]], an annual trade show organized by the National Association of Home Builders * [[IBS Software|IBS Software Services]], IT solution service provider for Travel, Transportation and Logistic Industry. == Fiction == * ''IBS'', a satirical news channel on the BBC's programme ''[[Broken News]]'' * ''International Brotherhood of Stevedores'', a dockworkers union featured in season two of the TV show [[The Wire]] == Medical == * [[Irritable bowel syndrome]], a disorder of the bowel * [[Ichthyosis bullosa of Siemens]], a genetic skin disorder == Science and technology == * [[Intrabeam Scattering]], a collective effect arising in high-intensity particle beams * [[Sputter deposition#Ion-beam sputtering|Ion-beam sputtering]], a type of sputter deposition * [[Identity by type|Identical by State]], a genetic term also known as non-identical by type (NIBT) * [[Instruction Based Sampling]], an implementation of a [[hardware performance counter]] used to collect performance data in a superscalar microprocessor * [[Ideal body size]], a component of the figure rating scale ==Construction== *IBS stand for [[Industrialised Building System (IBS)|Industrialised Building System]],term used in Malaysia for a technique of construction. {{Disambiguation}}
